thread.title: Fans question if Kourtney Kardashian REALLY pierced four-year-old daughter Penelope's lip
thread.title_full: Fans question if Kourtney Kardashian REALLY pierced four-year-old daughter Penelope's lip

author: Vicki Newman
title: Fans question if Kourtney Kardashian REALLY pierced four-year-old daughter Penelope's lip
text:
Is Penelope's lip really pierced? (Photo: Instagram) Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Fans of the Kardashians are wondering if Kourtney really let her four-year-old daughter get her lip pierced. 
The reality babe shared a cute snap of her lying in bed with Penelope, who is fast asleep next to her after a late night watching the Oscars. 
Kourtney shared the picture on Instagram, writing: "Our Oscar Sunday. Yes, that's a lip ring. Thanks @kimkardashian. (sic)" 
In the snap, the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star - who also shares Mason, seven, and Reign, two, with her ex-partner Scott Disick - is seen wearing a white bathrobe as her daughter rests on her left shoulder. Read More How they've changed! The Kardashian sisters are virtually unrecognisable from their pre-fame past Kourtney is also mum to Reign and Mason (Photo: Splash) 
She says the lip ring was a gift from Penelope's aunt, Kim Kardashian West, and while it's more than likely a clip-on, fans asked if it was real, with some even criticising her parenting skills. 
"Why don't you just add a belly button ring too," said one follower. 
"Is the lip ring real," asked another. 
Another said: "Ridiculous how can you give it to such a little girl" 
While others pointed out that it probably wasn't real. Kourtney and Scott aren't together any more (Photo: Splash) 
One said: "I doubt the lip ring is real" 
Meanwhile, rumours have suggested Kourtney and Scott, 33, could be on the cusp of rekindling their turbulent romance. 
However, a source recently claimed Kourtney is happily single for the time being. 
The star is instead directing all of her energy towards her children, rather than her romantic life. 
An insider explained: "Kourtney and Scott are not back together or even at the point of trying to make things work. Kourtney is happy being a parent right now and that is her number one interest right now.
